article_title: British banks grapple with business demands for coronavirus lifelines
article_description: Some banks in Britain are struggling to provide financial support to homeowners and businesses battered by the coronavirus pandemic  with demand surging after the government announced a series of aid measures including an emergency lending scheme
article_content: LONDON  Reuters    Some banks in Britain are struggling to provide financial support to homeowners and businesses battered by the coronavirus pandemic  with demand surging after the government announced a series of aid measures including an emergency lending    3773 chars
